meanings.sent1: After the ice cream melted, the resolidifications made it hard again.
meanings.sent2: The resolidifications of the lava turned it into rock.
meanings.sent3: The resolidifications of the jello were so quick, it looked like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the resolidifications of a once-melted dream.
meanings.sent5: The resolidifications of the chocolate created a crunchy texture.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming solid again.
meanings.sent1: The resolidifications of the liquid metal formed a strong bond.
meanings.sent2: During winter, the resolidifications of the snow made the ground slippery.
meanings.sent3: The resolidifications of the jelly beans in the sun were like a tasty science experiment.
meanings.sent4: His ideas went through resolidifications, becoming more concrete with each revision.
meanings.sent5: The resolidifications of the mud after the rain made it difficult to walk through.
